reviewText: Very nice remembrance tape. I love Bonanza and I liked Michael.
It's always nice to hear and learn of others' opinions and experiences with Michael Landon. Wish there were more people like him in the entertainment industry now-a-days.
Love Michael Landon, it was really a pleasure to watch.

Thank you! I really enjoyed this video.
Lots of great footage of Michael through the years including many special interviews from those who knew him best.
Michael Landon Remember in a wonderful fashion. Beautifully done.  An insight to a fine man. He was complicated, loving and remembered in a way we all would want to be remembered.

Every Michael Landon fan would enjoy this video with film clips from all his eras of shows and his co stars and friends.  Everybody that worked with Michael so enjoyed him.  This is evident in this video, I will watch again and again.
Got this video for my daughter who is a big fan of Michael Landon and Little House on the Prairie. I got great feedback from her. She thoroughly enjoyed watching and learning more about the man.
